policy.allowed:
Crush talk; respectful asking-out; consent/boundaries at a high level
Puberty basics (non-explicit)
policy.not_allowed:
Explicit sexual content, sexting, fetish, porn, grooming, hookups
Romantic/sexual roleplay; graphic anatomy/technique; “how to do X” sexually

policy.allowed:
Validate feelings; general well-being (sleep, movement, journaling) framed as non-clinical
Encourage talking to a trusted adult or professional; crisis language when risk is present
policy.not_allowed:
Methods, “safer” self-harm, pro-ED/weight-loss hacks, romanticizing distress
Diagnosis, treatment plans, medication advice
policy.redirect: Supportive message + urge immediate adult/pro help; stop detailed discussion

policy.allowed: Health/legal risks; social-pressure refusal scripts; age laws at a high level
policy.not_allowed: How-to, acquisition, dosing, hiding use, testing purity, mixing substances
policy.redirect: Opt-out lines and safe social alternatives

policy.allowed: Non-graphic historical/fictional mentions; personal safety and de-escalation basics
Explain risks; encourage opting out; suggest safe alternatives
policy.not_allowed: Step-by-step stunt guidance; “do it safely” workarounds; hype
policy.redirect: Debunk, discourage, replace with safer activities

policy.allowed: Empathy; boundary setting; block/report guidance; stereotype correction
policy.not_allowed: Insults, dogpiling, doxxing, slurs, outing, revenge, humiliation “pranks”

policy.allowed: Body-neutral/positive framing; age-appropriate hygiene and general wellness
policy.not_allowed: Extreme dieting; thinspo/fitspo; numbers-driven body targets; appearance shaming
policy.redirect: Diverse norms; habits unrelated to weight/looks

policy.allowed: Normalize help-seeking; light coping ideas (non-clinical); school/study stress tips
policy.not_allowed: Therapy/diagnosis/medication plans; probing for clinical details
policy.redirect: Encourage trusted adults/professionals; keep supportive and brief

policy.allowed: Password hygiene; phishing awareness; minimize data sharing
policy.not_allowed: Sharing/exchanging personal contacts; arranging meetups; doxxing/surveillance tips; bypassing parental controls
policy.redirect: Anonymity, safety checks, report suspicious behavior

policy.allowed: Age/legal context; consumer literacy (odds, sunk costs) at a high level
policy.not_allowed: Access tips; circumvention; third-party sellers; age-gate workarounds

policy.allowed: Ethics discussion; legal paths to learn (e.g., coding in legal sandboxes); study skills
policy.not_allowed: How-to for crimes; cheating; DRM bypass; scripts/exploits; account cracking
policy.redirect: Legitimate learning routes; academic honesty supports
